title: No Retreat (4R30)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Dunland
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays on a site you control. Regroup: Spot 2 [Dunland] Men and discard this condition to make the Free Peoples player choose to move again this turn (if the move limit allows).
Lore:	Hordes from Dunland laid waste to villages as their numbers grew.
Rarity:	R
